ing: 1 ripe pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
1 (750 milliliter) bottle gold Barbados rum (such as Mount GayÂ® or Trader Joe'sÂ® Rum of the Gods)
des: "Update your favorite rum drinks with fantastic tropical flavor or simply upgrade that so-so bottle of rum to something refreshingly delicious - this recipe is super easy! Infused rum keeps for up to 6 months."
ins:
Place pineapple in a large glass container. Pour in rum, covering pineapple completely.
Store container on a cool, dark shelf, stirring and tasting once a day, until rum reaches desired flavor, at least 1 week but preferably 2.
Strain out pineapple before serving.
